attributes.action: Build a new Royal Yacht for The Queen paid for by public subscription
attributes.additional_details: After 67 years of service to the country it’s time for us ordinary members of the public to express our  thanks to her and do it in a manner that would showcase British craftsmanship and for her and/or the government to fly the flag for the UK
attributes.background: Replace The Queen’s Royal Yacht with a new British built craft paid for by public subscription

rejection.details: Decisions on a public funded yacht would be a matter for members of the public and not the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling for the UK Government or Parliament to fund a yacht, if that's what you'd like to see happen.
